task.title: How to get to Panama City Beach
task.shortdesc: We are going with a big group of people in the Cru club at Virginia Tech so we will be taking a charter bus down to Florida.

context.p: Cru will do the job of contacting the charter bus company.

step.cmd: Let Cru know you are coming on the trip
Put down your deposit for the bus fare
Be in the Cassell lot at 6 a.m. on Monday, March 6 with all of your bags packed for the trip.
